name: YoutubeNLP
description: A Streamlit app for analyzing YouTube video comments using NLP techniques.

name: Populpy
description: Fetches related searches for a given query from Google Trends, including peak dates and popularity scores.

name: ZTodo
description: A SQLite-based task manager plugin for Oh-My-Zsh with priority levels, categories, deadlines, and efficient search.

name: VsCodex
description: A VSCode extension that brings features similar to the OpenAI Playground.

name: AutoFire
description: A script that enables autofire for a key. Enable it, press the key, and leave the computer away!

name: Simple-Stupid-Todo
description: A simple, command-line todo application written in Bash, storing tasks in a JSON file.
